title: Indonesia’s cyclone tragedy exposes lethal cost of forest destruction
snippet:
Indonesia is facing renewed calls to curb deforestation and tighten oversight of forest concessions after a rare tropical cyclone tore across Sumatra, unleashing floods and landslides that have killed more than 700 people and left hundreds missing.
The disaster has prompted a nationwide debate over whether the tragedy was driven primarily by climate change-fuelled extreme weather or by decades of ecological destruction in a region that has been transformed by plantations, mining and large-scale...

title: China wife of gay husband contests estate against his lover, parents after man’s death
snippet:
A gay man in northern China who married his boyfriend’s sister to secure relocation compensation died in a traffic accident, sparking a bitter dispute over his estate between his wife, his lover and his parents.
Xu Tian, a 48-year-old Beijing native and senior executive at a state-owned company, had been in a 10-year relationship with his boyfriend, Xue Chong, a doctor two years his junior.
Neighbours said the gay couple often posed as father and son in public.
Both families knew about their...

title: Taiwan says China sometimes stages mock attacks on foreign navy ships in strait
snippet: China says it alone exercises sovereignty and jurisdiction over the major trade route.

title: Cyclone catastrophe in Sri Lanka awakens volunteer spirit
snippet: Fishing boats deliver relief supplies to flooded suburbs as community kitchens churn out food aid.

title: Shai-Hulud 2.0 NPM malware attack exposed up to 400,000 dev secrets
snippet: The second Shai-Hulud attack last week exposed around 400,000 raw secrets after infecting hundreds of packages in the NPM (Node Package Manager) registry and publishing stolen data in 30,000 GitHub repositories. [...]

title: Nigeria grants asylum to Guinea-Bissau presidential candidate after coup
snippet: Nigeria says it is sheltering Fernando Dias in its embassy in Bissau, citing an imminent threat to his life.

title: University of Pennsylvania confirms new data breach after Oracle hack
snippet: ​The University of Pennsylvania (Penn) has confirmed a new data breach after attackers stole documents containing personal information from its Oracle E-Business Suite servers in August. [...]

title: CISA Releases Five Industrial Control Systems Advisories
snippet: CISA released five Industrial Control Systems (ICS) Advisories. These advisories provide timely information about current security issues, vulnerabilities, and exploits surrounding ICS. ICSA-25-336-01 Industrial Video & Control Longwatch ICSA-25-336-02 Iskra iHUB and iHUB Lite ICSMA-25-336-01 Mirion Medical EC2 Software NMIS BioDose ICSA-25-201-01 Mitsubishi Electric CNC Series (Update A) ICSA-23-157-02 Mitsubishi Electric MELSEC iQ-R Series/iQ-F Series (Update C) CISA encourages users and administrators to review newly released ICS Advisories for technical details and mitigations.

title: Death toll in Indonesia floods passes 600
snippet: Another 500 people are missing, while thousands more have been injured after a cyclone hit the region.

title: Appeals court disqualifies ex-Trump lawyer Alina Habba as New Jersey prosecutor
snippet: An appeals court disqualified Alina Habba, Trump's former personal attorney, from serving as US Attorney for New Jersey.

title: CISA Releases Six Industrial Control Systems Advisories
snippet: CISA released six Industrial Control Systems (ICS) Advisories. These advisories provide timely information about current security issues, vulnerabilities, and exploits surrounding ICS. ICSA-25-324-01 Automated Logic WebCTRL Premium Server ICSA-25-324-02 ICAM365 CCTV Camera Multiple Models ICSA-25-324-03 Opto 22 GRV-EPIC and GRV-RIO ICSA-25-324-04 Festo MSE6-C2M/D2M/E2M ICSA-25-324-05 Festo Didactic products ICSA-25-324-06 Emerson Appleton UPSMON-PRO CISA encourages users and administrators to review newly released ICS Advisories for technical details and mitigations.
